TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed ConcurrencyMode extends System.Enum

summary.span: 指定服务类是支持单线程还是多线程操作模式。

span.span: Specifies whether a service class supports single-threaded or multi-threaded modes of operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 与 属性一起使用，可指定服务类是支持单线程还是多线程操作模式。 is used in conjunction with the property to specify whether a service class supports single-threaded or multi-threaded modes of operation. 单线程操作可以是可重入操作，也可以是不可重入操作。A single-threaded operation can be either reentrant or non-reentrant. 下表显示 [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] 何时允许在进行其他操作的同时调用一个操作，这取决于 。The following table shows when [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] permits an operation to be invoked while another one is in progress, depending upon the . |ConcurrencyMode 值ConcurrencyMode Value|是否允许调用新操作？Can a new operation be invoked?| |---------------------------|-------------------------------------| |SingleSingle|从不。Never.| |可重入Reentrant|仅在调用其他服务或回调时。Only while invoking another service or a callback.| |多种Multiple|始终。Always.| ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示使用单、 可重入和多个之间的差别。The following code example demonstrates the different between using Single, Reentrant, and Multiple. 此示例不编译真正实现后，但确实可以说明的线程处理保证，WCF 进行并对操作代码的意义的类型。This sample does not compile without a real implementation behind it, but does demonstrate the kind of threading guarantees that WCF makes and what that means for your operation code. [!code-csharp[C_BestPractices-Concurrency#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/c_bestpractices-concurrency/cs/reentrantandmultiple.cs#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.ServiceModel.ConcurrencyMode Multiple = int32(2)

summary.span: 因为其他线程可以随时更改服务对象，所以必须始终处理同步与状态一致性。

span.span: Because other threads can change your service object at any time, you must handle synchronization and state consistency at all times.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.ServiceModel.ConcurrencyMode Reentrant = int32(1)

summary.span: 服务实例是单线程的，且接受可重入调用。

span.span: The service instance is single-threaded and accepts reentrant calls.

summary.span: 可重入服务接受在调用其他服务的同时进行调用；因此在调出之前，您需要负责让对象的状态一致，而在调出之后，必须确认本地操作数据有效。

span.span: The reentrant service accepts calls when you call another service; it is therefore your responsibility to leave your object state consistent before callouts and you must confirm that operation-local data is valid after callouts.

summary.span: 请注意，只有通过 WCF 通道调用其他服务，才能解锁服务实例。

span.span: Note that the service instance is unlocked only by calling another service over a WCF channel.

summary.span: 在此情况下，已调用的服务可以通过回调重入第一个服务。

span.span: In this case, the called service can reenter the first service via a callback.

summary.span: 如果第一个服务不可重入，则该调用顺序会导致死锁。

span.span: If the first service is not reentrant, the sequence of calls results in a deadlock.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.ServiceModel.ConcurrencyMode Single = int32(0)

summary.span: 服务实例是单线程的，且不接受可重入调用。

span.span: The service instance is single-threaded and does not accept reentrant calls.

summary.span: 如果 属性为 ，且其他消息在实例处理调用的同时到达，则这些消息必须等待，直到服务可用或消息超时为止。

span.span: If the property is , and additional messages arrive while the instance services a call, these messages must wait until the service is available or until the messages time out.
